text: Royal Sporting Club Anderlecht, usually known as Anderlecht (, , ) or RSCA (, , ), is a Belgian professional football club from Anderlecht, Brussels. They play in the Belgian Pro League. They are the most successful Belgian football team in European competitions (with 5 trophies) and Belgian Pro League (33 championship wins). ==Honours== ===Domestic=== *Belgian First Division: **Winners (33): 1946–47, 1948–49, 1949–50, 1950–51, 1953–54, 1954–55, 1955–56, 1958–59, 1961–62, 1963–64, 1964–65, 1965–66, 1966–67, 1967–68, 1971–72, 1973–74, 1980–81, 1984–85, 1985–86, 1986–87, 1990–91, 1992–93, 1993–94, 1994–95, 1999–00, 2000–01, 2003–04, 2005–06, 2006–07, 2009–10, 2011–12, 2012–13, 2013–14 *Belgian Second Division: **Winners (2): 1923–24, 1934–35 *Belgian Cup: **Winners (9): 1964–65, 1971–72, 1972–73, 1974–75, 1975–76, 1987–88, 1988–89, 1993–94, 2007–08 *Belgian League Cup: **Winners (1): 1999–00 *Belgian Supercup: **Winners (11): 1985, 1987, 1993, 1995, 2000, 2001, 2006, 2007, 2010, 2012, 2013 *Bruges Matins: **Winners (2): 1985, 1988 ===International=== *UEFA Cup Winners' Cup: **Winners (2): 1975-76, 1977-78 *UEFA Cup / UEFA Europa League: **Winners (1): 1982-83 *UEFA Super Cup: **Winners (2): 1976, 1978 *Toulon Tournament: **Winners (1): 1967 *Amsterdam Tournament: **Winners (1): 1976 ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Belgian football clubs Category:Anderlecht
title: R.S.C. Anderlecht
